overview: Mr. Solomon is a serial entrepreneur in the high-tech field and has been responsible for commercializing several innovations in the smart-packaging, biotech and communications field, leading to licensing arrangements and to three â€œexitsâ€ involving stock sales to public companies. Since 2003 he has concentrated on start-up ventures in the drug-delivery and dispensing field, and specialized in IP development in this field. Before that he was the Marketing Manager of Novobiotec Ltd., (Israel) a life-sciences company commercializing a novel probiotic drug delivery mechanism and a Director of Profile Sol-Gel Ltd. - a developer of technology for fabricating lifetime-indicators.
